creator: srikandula@indiatimes.com
text:
Hi,
Can any one suggest how to create page break in a style sheet at a desired 
locations.

I was able to change the print set up but could not break the code at my 
required places.This is important for me.

creator: dmui@apache.org
text:
Page breaks are now supported in the latest 2.0 Branch.  Production/developemnt
release to shortly follow.
